ADOPT.Definition: (of an animal) to take an animal that has been left in a place such as a rescue centre, and keep it as your pet

ADOPTING.Definition: (of an animal) to take an animal that has been left in a place such as a rescue centre, and keep it as your pet

ALGORITHM.Definition: a set of mathematical instructions or rules that, especially if given to a computer, will help to calculate an answer to a problem

ALGORITHMS.Definition: a set of mathematical instructions or rules that, especially if given to a computer, will help to calculate an answer to a problem

ASBESTOS.Definition: a soft, greyish-white material that does not burn, used especially in the past in buildings, clothing, etc. as a protection against fire and as a form of insulation (= a way of stopping heat from escaping)

AUCTION.Definition: a usually public sale of goods or property, where people make higher and higher bids (= offers of money) for each thing, until the thing is sold to the person who will pay most

BID.Definition: to offer a particular amount of money for something that is for sale and compete against other people to buy it, especially at a public sale of goods or property

CRAWLERS.Definition: computer programs that automatically searches for information on the internet, usually in order to index (= list) internet content

DISTINCTIVE.Definition: something that is distinctive is easy to recognise because it is different from other things

IMPLICATIONS.Definition: the effect that an action or decision will have on something else in the future

POPUPS.Definition: an advertisement that is shown in a new window in front of the window that you are looking at on a website

ROUND TRIP.Definition: iIf you make a round trip, you go on a journey and return to where you started from

SCANNING.Definition: looking at something carefully, with the eyes or with a machine, in order to get information

SCRATCHED THE SURFACE.Definition: to deal with only a small part of a subject or a problem

TRADEOFF.Definition: a balancing of two opposing situations or qualities, both of which are desired
